Company Name: Abdullah Saad Mohammed Abo Moati for Bookstores Co (9500)
Description: Abdullah Saad Mohammed Abo Moati for Bookstores (known as: Abo Moati) is a public company, listed on Saudi Stock Exchange “Parallel Market” (NOMU) since February 2017. Abo Moati operates within the commercial & professional services sector focusing on office services & supplies. Abo Moati is based in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia and was established in June 1994.
